title: The.Last.Remnant.MULTi6.iNTERNAL-PROPHET
description:
The Last Remnant *iNTERNAL* (c) SQUARE ENIX

release date ...: February 2767
protection .....: Steam
# of discs .....: 1
languages ......: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/JP

---------------------------------------------------

Mitra, yama,  qsiti,  sovani...  These  four  races
exist in one world. A world filled with Remnants  -
mysterious  artifacts  from  an  ancient  era.  Who
created the Remnant? How long  ago?  And  for  what
purpose? With these questions left unanswered,  the
Remnants became beneficial tools used for the  good
of civilization. The world was at  peace...  or  so
it seemed. Who was to know  such  darkness  lay  in
wait? The powers of the Remnants  slowly  began  to
change the world's balance. A  rift  slowly  formed
between those who ruled and those who obeyed.  This
was the dawning of a new era - an era of  countless
frays that would be brought upon the world by those
enslaved by their own lust for  power.  A  thousand
years later, the journey of one young  man  begins.
Featuring   an   enthralling    story,    countless
characters and an intricate battle  system,  Square
Enix brings the RPG experience known  as  The  Last
Remnant to the PC. Discover new strategies  in  the
improved battle system.

---------------------------------------------------

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the cracked content from PROPHET dir to
Binaries folder
4- Go To Hell!

INTERNAL NOTE:
Our last release is working fine, but we decided to
re-release this game. Our initial release was a 1:1
copy of the original DVD discs  with  lots  of  not
needed Steam files. In this release  we  have  made
our own installer with high  compression  and  it's
over 2GB smaller and now fits 1 DVD9 disc.

NOTE:
You can select your language in the Options menu.
Game version is v1.0.515.0.
